message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90% and you get 10%.
That's not fair, Alice. How about a more reasonable split?  I'll take 40% and you take 60%.
I'm willing to compromise, but I still need a larger share.  How about I take 70% and you get 30%?
This is getting us nowhere, Alice.  I'm offering you a slightly better deal at 55%. Take it before inflation eats away at your share even more!
I'm still trying to get a fair deal. I'll take 60% and you can have 40%.  This is my final offer before things get even worse for me.
